# INShareFocusStatusIntentResponseCode.failureRequiringAppLaunch

**Case**

The user needs to launch your app to update their focus status.

## Declaration

```swift
case failureRequiringAppLaunch
```

## Reporting a Problem

- **INShareFocusStatusIntentResponseCode.failure**: Your intent handler is unable to handle the intent.
- **INShareFocusStatusIntentResponseCode.unspecified**: An unspecified response code.
